media:group.media:title: A Teacher Defends Wikipedia
media:group.media:description:
My friend @J.J. McCullough recently released a video trashing Wikipedia: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-vmSFO1Zfo8&t

...and I felt compelled to respond.

My Wikipedia song:
